entry.title: Just Did It.
entry.content:
A common roadblock that many people — including myself — come across when trying to do anything, is always waiting for things to be perfect before starting.

It’s a trap.

Things are never perfect, and if you always wait, you will never get anything done, or do what you want to do. The solution to this problem? Just do it. No matter how bad or unfinished something is, aim to get it 80% of the way there, and then ship it out.

Kind of like what I just did just now.
